Gangon fires upon Shredder....he had returned, noticing BrightBlade wasn't
following.. "back to help ya!..." he said....he helps her to her feet while
firing.........
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moon Mist" <shadowwarrior_ax@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 24, 2000 11:31 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
> * BrightBlade snarled and dodged out of the way as Shredder fires at her
but
> get's the hit in the left shoulder, she yells in surprise and falls on her
> back. Just as he back touches the ground her head strikes a rock and she's
> knocked half unconscious, BrightBlade moaned as a head ache spread from
the
> back of her head to behind her optics.
> She looks up at the sky, she couldn't fail Hell Beast...bot her Lord!
> BrightBlade sat up and rubbed her temples as she looked off to the side,
her
> gun was now out of reach...oh no!
> She turns and looks at Shredder, she growls deeply as she rises to one
> knee...*
>
> " You won't take me traitor, not alive!!"
